morning.text: Seems you left your brave pants at home. Want me to wait while you go get them?
morning.author: Poppy

morning.text: Rules are made to be broken... like buildings! Or people!
morning.author: Jinx

morning.text: Live today like youâ€™re going to die tomorrow.
morning.author: Irelia

morning.text: Losing is just an opportunity to shine even brighter.
morning.author: Lux

afternoon.text: Spend enough time in the darkness and you'll see monsters everywhere.
afternoon.author: Vayne

afternoon.text: Guns don't kill people. I mean, until you shoot them. Then they kill everything!
afternoon.author: Jinx

afternoon.text: Peace is not perennial. It must be constantly sowed.
afternoon.author: Irelia

afternoon.text: I'll show these house cats real claws.
afternoon.author: Nidalee

afternoon.text: Every adventure is better with a friend!
afternoon.author: Nunu & Willump

afternoon.text: So many noobs, will matchmaking ever find true balance?
afternoon.author: Akali

evening.text: If Neeko can be everyone, how can Neeko be sure she's anyone?
evening.author: Neeko

evening.text: I don't ask for much. Just everything.
evening.author: LeBlanc

evening.text: I really need a new gun. But don't tell my other guns.
evening.author: Jinx

evening.text: It's alright if you don't like me. We can't all have good taste.
evening.author: Samira

night.text: Fear the assassin with no master.
night.author: Akali

night.text: You wanna play too? It'll be fun!
night.author: Annie

night.text: I know this place... Some part of me remembers.
night.author: Ahri

night.text: I will bury the world in ice.
night.author: Lissandra
